text: aur (hamane qaum) samood kee taraph unake bhaee saaleh ko rasool banaakar bheja to unhonen (un logon se kaha) ai meree qaum khuda hee kee ibaadat karo aur usake siva koee tumhaara maabood nahin hai tumhaare paas to tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraph se vaazee aur raushan daleel aa chukee hai ye khuda kee bhejee huee oontanee tumhaare vaaste ek maujiza hai to tum log usako chhod do ki khuda kee zameen mein jahaan chaahe charatee phire aur use koee takaleef na pahunchao varana tum dardanaak azaab mein giraphtaar ho jaaage
